data.meta_description: Our radiology department is pleased to offer convenient, free parking, same-day appointments, and a 24-hour report turnaround.
data.text:
At Hudson Regional Hospital, we rely on imaging and radiological technology to help diagnose and treat many conditions. Our radiology department is pleased to offer convenient, free parking, same-day appointments, and a 24-hour report turnaround.

Hudson Regional Hospital’s Radiology department welcomes both inpatient and outpatient needs for imaging tests. Our caring and compassionate staff understands how anxiety often accompanies the need for special imaging procedures. Our goal is to make you as comfortable as possible so you will return to us for all of your imaging needs.

Hudson Regional Hospital is committed to using the minimum amount of radiation necessary to achieve the best films possible. Our radiologists are all board-certified, specializing in interpreting medical images and procedures. The Radiology Department is committed to providing exceptional care and is dedicated to delivering the highest quality imaging services. The American College of Radiology has awarded CT Scan, Mammography, and Ultrasound an Accreditation for meeting the nationally accepted standards and safety guidelines.
